title: Say Yes to the Dress: Poland
overview: The beloved British stylist and designer came to Poland to help future brides choose their one-and-only dream wedding dress. We are very lucky! Poland is the only place in the world outside of Great Britain where Gok records his shows. His charisma, temperament, knowledge, and experience are qualities that will definitely be useful to every bride when deciding on a dress for one of the most important days in her life. No one like Gok Wan can find a way to a woman's heart, suggest what suits her personality and what is suitable for a particular body shape. This famous fashion enthusiast also has the unique gift of creating fantastic creations in which one small detail makes every heroine of the program immediately feel special. But will the brides listen? What about the opinions of the family, the mother-in-law, and friends? One thing is certain â€“ excitement is guaranteed!
